Package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.core

Interface Endpoint<T extends Enum<T>>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParametrizedEndpoint
public interface Endpoint<T extends Enum<T>>
Represents an API endpoint definition.

This interface defines the essential properties and methods for interacting with an API endpoint. It supports request configuration, query and path parameter management, and automatic request logging.

Author:

  • Method Details

    • method

      io.restassured.http.Method method()
      Retrieves the HTTP method associated with this endpoint.
      Returns:
      The HTTP method of the endpoint.

    • url

      String url()
      Retrieves the relative URL path of this endpoint.
      Returns:
      The endpoint URL.

    • enumImpl

      T enumImpl()
      Retrieves the enum implementation of this endpoint.
      Returns:
      The enum representing this endpoint.

    • baseUrl

      default String baseUrl()
      Retrieves the base URL for this endpoint.
      Returns:
      The base URL from the API configuration.

    • headers

      default Map<String,List<String>> headers()
      Retrieves the headers associated with this endpoint.

      By default, this returns an empty map unless overridden.

      Returns:
      A map containing header key-value pairs.

    • defaultConfiguration

      default io.restassured.specification.RequestSpecification defaultConfiguration()
      Prepares a default RequestSpecification with base configuration.

      Configures base URI, headers, and logging based on API configuration.

      Returns:
      The configured request specification.

    • prepareRequestSpec

      default io.restassured.specification.RequestSpecification prepareRequestSpec(Object body)
      Prepares a request specification for the endpoint, optionally including a request body.
      Parameters:
      body - The request body to be sent with the request.
      Returns:
      A configured RequestSpecification instance.

    • withQueryParam

      default Endpoint<T> withQueryParam(String key, Object value)
      Creates a new instance of this endpoint with an added query parameter.
      Parameters:
      key - The query parameter name.
      value - The query parameter value.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the endpoint with the query parameter added.

    • withPathParam

      default Endpoint<T> withPathParam(String key, Object value)
      Creates a new instance of this endpoint with an added path parameter.
      Parameters:
      key - The path parameter name.
      value - The path parameter value.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the endpoint with the path parameter added.

    • withHeader

      default Endpoint<T> withHeader(String key, String value)
      Creates a new instance of this endpoint with an added request header.
      Parameters:
      key - The header name.
      value - The header value.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the endpoint with the header added.

    • withHeader

      default Endpoint<T> withHeader(String key, List<String> values)
      Creates a new instance of this endpoint with an added request header supporting multiple values.
      Parameters:
      key - The header name.
      values - A list of values for the header.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the endpoint with the multi-value header added.
